title: Acting Turns Into Reality: Love Was Always Here - Novel Updates
tags: Cohabitation   Comedic Undertone   Familial Love   Female Protagonist   Modern Day   Pretend Lovers   Shy Characters   Wealthy Characters
author: Xiao Xiao Mu Tong   小小牧童
description: She drives a taxi in her father’s place and meets a handsome man. Their 128 yuan taxi fare starts a relationship that is hard to find in a millennium. Real acting and fake acting. Fake words of love and real words of love. They think that everything was fake. Only when they separate do they realize that love was always here. The love was never fake.>
